title: Steam Deck Reviews are Out! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.25.22
description:
Go to http://purple.com/KINDAFUNNY and use code KINDAFUNNY for 10% off any order of $200 or more!

Download the DoorDash app and enter code KINDAFUNNY for 25% off your first order!

Blessing is joined by Xcast's Parris Lily to talk about PlayStation's Project Spartacus, Steam Deck reviews, and more!

Follow Parris: https://twitter.com/vicious696

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:27 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:52 - We have more reported details on PlayStation’s Project Spartacus
00:15:20 - It Takes Two picks up Game of the Year at 2022 DICE Awards
00:21:46 - Ads
00:23:55 - Steam Deck Review round up
00:33:56 - Switch’s latest N64 update finally fixes Zelda’s Water Temple room
00:39:27 - PC PSA: Elden Ring is working out its PC performance issues
00:47:00 - Out today
00:52:36 - Squad Up: Theo John - Life - thelegendoftheo.wordpress.com
00:53:31 - You‘re Wrong
